item.title: About
item.description: Passionate DevOps Engineer with 8+ years active programming experience, seeking to leverage proven IaC and CI/CD technologies to raise product delivery speed and software quality. In-depth knowledge of Linux kernel and networking stack, with strong skills in performance tuning and system-level troubleshooting. Hands-on experience in GCP, AWS, Kubernetes, Helm, Terraform. Skilled in Golang, Python, JavaScript, C. Learning BPF.
